actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the solar energy and conservation loan program authorization.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to increase loan authorizations to small business concerns for solar energy and energy conservation measures from $30,000,000 to $50,000,000 in direct and immediate participation loans and from $45,000,000 to $100,000,000 in guaranteed loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the solar energy and conservation loan program authorization.
